title: Structures & Mixed Concepts
concept: This level introduces structures in C and mixes previously learned concepts such as arrays, loops, and functions to handle structured data.

challenges.title: Student Structure
challenges.description: Define a struct Student with name (string) and marks (int). Read one student and print name and marks in one line separated by space.

challenges.title: Array of Students - Highest Marks
challenges.description: Read N students (name and marks). Print the name of student with highest marks.
challenges.inputDescription: N then name & marks of each.

challenges.title: Point Structure Distance
challenges.description: Define a struct Point with x,y (ints). Read two points and print Manhattan distance |x1-x2|+|y1-y2|.

challenges.title: Complex Number Addition
challenges.description: Define struct Complex{int real, imag;}. Read two complex numbers and print their sum in format a+bi (no spaces).

challenges.title: Employee with Max Salary
challenges.description: struct Emp {char name[100]; int salary;}. Print the name of employee with max salary.
challenges.inputDescription: N, then N lines: name salary.

challenges.title: Mixed: Even Count and Sum
challenges.description: Read N and N integers in array. Print count of even numbers and their sum separated by space.

challenges.title: String + Number Mix
challenges.description: Read a name and an age and print: name-age (dash between, no spaces).

challenges.title: Struct and Function
challenges.description: Create a function that takes struct Student and returns 1 if marks >= 50 else 0. Print Pass or Fail.

challenges.title: Array of Structs - Average Marks
challenges.description: Read N students with marks and print average marks (integer division allowed).
challenges.inputDescription: N, then N lines: name marks.

challenges.title: Mix: Struct + Max + Average
challenges.description: Read N students. Print name of topper and then average marks on next line.
challenges.outputDescription:
Line1: topper name
Line2: average marks
